languages.text: "Ты оскорбляешь правосудие Императора! Насмехаешься над Вольным Торговцем! Богохульствуешь! Не думай, что не поплатишься за это!"
"You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Do not think for one second that you will get away with this!"
languages.original_text: "Ты оскорбляешь правосудие Императора! Насмехаешься над Вольным Торговцем! Богохульствуешь! Не думай, что не поплатишься за это!"

traits.locale_text: "You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Don't even think that you will get away with this!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “你竟敢侮辱帝皇的审判！你竟敢辱骂行商浪人！别以为你能逃脱惩罚，你这亵渎分子！”
languages.original_text: "You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Do not think for one second that you will get away with this!"

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢侮辱帝皇的审判！你竟敢辱骂行商浪人！别以为你能逃脱惩罚，你这亵渎分子！”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「お前は皇帝の判断を侮辱している！自由開拓者への侮辱だ！冒涜しだ！一瞬たりとも、この罪から逃げられると思うな！」
languages.original_text: "You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Do not think for one second that you will get away with this!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は皇帝の判断を侮辱している！自由開拓者への侮辱だ！冒涜しだ！一瞬たりとも、この罪から逃げられると思うな！」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «¡Insulta el juicio del Emperador! ¡Se burla del título de Comerciante Independiente! ¡Blasfema! ¡No piense ni por un instante que se saldrá con la suya!».
languages.original_text: "You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Do not think for one second that you will get away with this!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Insulta el juicio del Emperador! ¡Se burla del Comerciante Independiente! ¡Blasfema! ¡No piense que se saldrá con la suya!».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ihr beleidigt das Urteil des Imperators! Ihr verspottet die Freihändlerin! Ihr betreibt Blasphemie! Glaubt ja nicht, dass Ihr damit davonkommt!"
languages.original_text: "You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Do not think for one second that you will get away with this!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr beleidigt das Urteil des Imperators! Ihr verspottet die Freihändlerin! Ihr betreibt Blasphemie! Glaubt ja nicht, dass Ihr damit davonkommt!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Vous insultez le jugement de l'Empereur ! Vous provoquez une libre-marchande ! Vous blasphémez ! N'espérez pas vous en sortir impunément ! »
languages.original_text: "You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Do not think for one second that you will get away with this!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous insultez le jugement de l'Empereur ! Vous provoquez une libre-marchande ! Vous blasphémez ! N'espérez pas vous en sortir impunément ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "İmparator'un hükmüne hakaret ettin! Hür Tacir'le alay ettin! Günah işledin! Bu yaptıklarının yanına kalacağını sanma!"
languages.original_text: "You insult the Emperor's judgement! You taunt the Rogue Trader! You blaspheme! Do not think for one second that you will get away with this!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un hükmüne hakaret ettin! Hür Tacir'le alay ettin! Günah işledin! Bu yaptıklarının yanına kalacağını sanma!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
